name: Laser Sword Fight - Lightsaber simulator
description:
Laser Saber Joke - this is a game application simulator joke lightsaber.

Love laser swords? How do they glow in the dark? Try our unique project. Choose a color and a sword and you will see right on the screen, laser weapons! Play with your friends in the dark on the street at night without light or at home. Arrange a real war on laser weapons!

Attention! This is just an emulator of the sword, it brings no harm to health, the application created for fun and entertainment.

Leave us your feedback and we will make our game even better for you!
